name: Chess VR
description:
Chess VR is available on applab now, please visit: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4722235917861509?ranking_trace=11089712...

Brave chess players, unsheathe your sword and commence a medieval duel on the chessboard!

Immerse yourself in the medieval castle or the pixel-style arena to achieve multi-scene travel. Try to interact with pieces and personages, something interesting might occur. Of course, you can challenge our knights and heroes, the iron throne awaits the conqueror!
Function Update

  • Online Mode: Combat your fellow players
  • Unlock new pixel-style arena
  • Animations for pieces added: Immersion experience improving

Core Features

  • 8 AI difficulty levels
  • Pieces animations: richer and more fun experience
  • Two scenes: Medieval Castle & Pixel-style Arena
  • 1000+ puzzles waiting for you to challenge
  • Professional ELO algorithm to help you match players of the same level

We will constantly optimize and update to bring you a better experience. Feel free to leave feedback in comments, we will have lucky draws randomly. Contact and find more information in our Discord account: discord.chessvrgame.com
The following features will be released shortly: Richer game backgrounds and settings, Tournament, Real-time voice chat.
Download it now!
